info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 8 at 10:50PM EDT until April 10 at 10:18AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river and locations in Indiana...
East Fork White River at Shoals and Williams.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River near Nora, below Eagle Valley Power Plant, near Centerton, at Ravenswood, Newberry, Spencer, Edwardsport, Hazleton, Elliston, and Petersburg.
East Fork White River near Rivervale, at Columbus, near Bedford, and Seymour.
.Major flooding continues on the White River from Elliston downstream., and on the East Fork White River downstream of Seymour. The crest of the White was near Elliston Tuesday evening and is forecast to reach Hazleton Saturday. Indianapolis area gages are expected to fall below flood stage tonight and Wednesday morning. Spencer should fall below flood by Friday morning. Flooding at Petersburg and Hazleton is expected to continue throughout next week. The crest on the East Fork was at Rivervale Tuesday evening and should reach Shoals on Thursday. The river should fall below flood stage at Columbus late overnight and work downriver from there. Shoals is expected to remain above flood stage until Tuesday the 15th.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...White River below Eagle Valley Power Plant.
* WHEN...Until late Thursday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 607.0 feet, Extensive flooding of agricultural lands. Blue Bluff and Paragon Roads are impassable. Flood waters affect a few homes in Waverly.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 603.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued Wednesday morning by around 1015 AM EDT /915 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING

area.areaDesc: Monroe, IN; Morgan, IN; Owen, IN
